title: Off to get a poke in the groin
content:
If all goes well, I’ll see you all on Sunday.

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content: If you are talking about a vasectomy, then you’ll want to milk it for more sympathy than it really deserves. Most people don’t know it isn’t that big of a thing. No implied pun intended.
Vasectomy?! Egad Dez ... ’twill be a vas deferens (_ouch!_).

Good luck!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145009im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Good_for_whatever_ails_ya_4019.jpg)

Hope all goes well.

Good luck, Chris!  
And speedy recovery.

Thanks all!  
Luckily, it is not a vasectomy, it is cardiac catheterization. They insert their tube through an artery in your groin and pass it up to your heart to unblock the coronary arteries.  
Well, off I go!

ChrisL

Great pix, Hiro :-)

All the best for a speedy recovery and good health.

—Bill

Luckily? They couldn’t find a place closer to the heart to start? I think I would have been trying to sell the virtues of the armpit for that.  
; )

Best wishes for a successful treatment.

As an aside, [http://www.pokeinthegroin.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145009/http:/www.pokeinthegroin.com/ "http://www.pokeinthegroin.com") doesn’t appear to be taken if your doctor would like to have an informational page.

best ’o luck, Dez.  
A few months ago I had an exam that made alien probe feel like a pony ride.  
Everything worked out fine... so hang in there Chris!

all the best, Chris  
R
Good procedure and speedy recovery!
All the best, Chris.
Hey!! Well ...?
I just talked to Chris on the phone. He’s home and recovering well. We can look forward to his good humor and good fonts returning here on Typophile in a few weeks.

Dear all,  
Thanks for the kind wishes!  
It has been a trying few weeks. I just got out of he hospital an hour ago. I was in three times in the last 2 weeks. The first time they put a STENT in one of my coronary arteries and sent me home 2 days later. 2 days after that I was back in the hospital with chest pain. This time, they put 3 more STENTS in different arteries. They sent me home 2 days later and a day after that, I had serious chest pain again. My wife Ruth called the ambulance and back I went. they did another Thallium stress test and blood enzymes and found out that I had a very minor heart attack so back I went to the Cath lab for a third poke in the groin. This time, they just changed my medications. At least now I am home again and looking forward to a hospital free week.

ChrisL
All the best for a speedy and full recovery, Chris
Jeez, Chris, I’m sorry to hear all that! I wish you a restful, hospital-free week, as you say.

Hope all works out and you have a swift recovery.  
Things have gotten pretty boring here, and no one knows how to throw such perfectly pontificating punchy puns prolifically punctuated with pithy punchinello.  
Welcome back pal.

Thanks all, I ’ll try to get my pun recipe book out as long as it is considered part of my heart-healthy diet. I have been banished to a low fat, low sodium, low sugar, low flavor diet. I guess they want me to learn to cook hospital food.

ChrisL
Hey Chris, I do hope you start to feel better soon. [Don’t give up on healthy food so easily.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705145009/http:/www.foodnetwork.com/food/lf_health/)

ThanksTiff!

ChrisL
